alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 9:50PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Edisto River near Givhans Ferry. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, major flooding occurs as the entire flood plain is inundated from Canadys to Highway 17. Extensive damage occurs to homes and cabins throughout this area and most river access roads are impassable. Flooding will also impede travel as portions of major roadways are closed to traffic including Parkers Ferry Road, Camp Buddy Road, and Wire Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 PM EDT Wednesday, the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday evening and continue rising to 14.8 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
